data.name: Apollo Active
data.description: An advanced online class management system that enables teachers to create and oversee scheduled sessions for remote teaching. The platform seamlessly handles time zone differences, sends session notifications via Slack webhooks, and generates detailed teacher schedule reports.

data.name: User Management System
data.description: This is just my hobby project, but I applied many skills I have learned to implement it (admin:1q2w3E*)

data.name: Apollo Ticket
data.description: An internal support system that empowers employees to create tickets for assistance from back-office personnel. The platform streamlines communication and issue resolution between various departments, fostering a more efficient and collaborative work environment.
